name: Kami Kami
description:
Submitted to VR-JAM 2020 hosted by phantomunboxing, C-Through, Valem

Theme "One Tool, Many Uses"

Game

Become a Kami (God in Japanese) and keep your followers and mother nature pleased.

Theme Relation

Hands are the ultimate tool, or better said, the tool to use tools. In VR, there are a lot of creative uses for hands as they can increase your sence of presence in the game. Thus in this game, your hands are the ultimate power of creation by creating land, people, animals, and nature.

Gameplay

  • Spawn both land, trees, houses, and animals
  • As a Kami, you have two responsibilities, mother nature and the people
  • Respect mother nature by continuing to put down new land and trees, this will give you Nature Points
  • Satisfy your followers by providing them with more houses and food, this will give you Prayer Points
  • If you run out of either, you lose. You can track your progress by looking at your hands in the game
  • You win when you are able to expand to all of the lands

Controls

  • Trigger: Grab either the Nature or Prayer Menu below you
    • Drag them out of the socket to place
    • Grab one of the objects to spawn
    • Throw the object
  • Left Hand Joystick: Move sideways and forwards/backwards
    • Moving forward/backwards depends on where you are looking
  • Right Hand Joystick:
    • Up/Down: Change Elevation/Height
    • Sideways: Turn (snap) quickly

Hope you enjoy! :)
